messages.en: level 21(post)
This is the last wave!
……Urghh!
Area secured! All clear!
Where’s the enemy’s commander?
——Not in this wave.
He seems to be lurking somewhere all along……

messages.zh: 是想消磨我们的体力，稳操胜券后再发动袭击吗？
messages.en: Trying to wear out our strengths first, and strike when he’s certain of success huh?

messages.zh: 整合运动的敌人非常擅长发动偷袭。我们在切尔诺伯格时就领教过了。
messages.en: Reunion Movement is very good at surprise attacks. We learned that at Chernobog.
Retreat for now——

messages.zh: 不能确保撤退路线的安全。
messages.en: We can’t ensure the safety of the retreating path.

messages.zh: 如果他们破坏建筑物来封锁路口，我们就危险了。
messages.en: If they destroy buildings to block the exits, we’ll be doomed.

messages.zh: ——立刻侦查其他的路线！越隐蔽越好！
messages.en: ——Search for other paths at once! The stealthier the better!

messages.zh: 阿米娅，四点钟方向，那个向下方街道移动的阶梯如何？
messages.en: Amiya, four o’clock direction, how about that stairway to the streets below?
That won’t be an easy get-through.
——Ambush! Beware!
Keep pushing them.

messages.zh: 别让他们有任何喘息的机会。
messages.en: Don’t give them any chance to rest.
……Officer.

messages.zh: ——贫民区......里有一些被感染的孩子。
messages.en: ——In the slum……there are some infected children.
If it’s possible……

messages.zh: 保护龙门是近卫局的责任。
messages.en: It’s the Guard Bureau’s duty to protect Lungmen.
The Infected are not Lungmen citizens.

messages.zh: 但龙门的感染者依然属于龙门。
messages.en: However, Lungmen’s Infected still belong to Lungmen.

messages.zh: 我没有任何理由向你保证，但我会尽到我的职责。
messages.en: I don’t have any reason to promise you this, but I will fulfill my duties.

messages.zh: 毕竟——这是我们一直在做的事情。
messages.en: After all——this is what we’ve been doing all along.
……Thank you……
——Do you know the reason we want you for?

messages.zh: ......我不清楚，但我觉得我身上你们唯一会想要的......
messages.en: ……I don’t know, but I think the only thing that you’d want from me is……

messages.zh: ——是的。龙门需要你父亲的遗物。
messages.en: ——Yes. Lungmen needs your father’s inheritance.

messages.zh: 一个物件，一条讯息，一个你才能打开的指令......等等。但确实在你这里。
messages.en: An object, a message, an instruction that only you can open……whatever it might be. But it is in your hands for sure.
——I understand. But what——is it?
The key of Chernobog.
HeHe, found you……
Let us begin——
